description: Suzuki Jun is http://anidb.net/ch7124 [Azusa]`s and http://anidb.net/ch5522 [Ui]`s classmate who often hangs out with the latter. Ui tries to get her to join the light music club but ultimately fails due to a strange visit to the club room. However, she starts to regret it when she hears about all the activities the club does. She has a pet cat.
name: Suzuki Jun
